lead_paragraph: New Orleans guard Rasual Butler faces charges after reportedly flashing a loaded gun near a Miami area nightclub. A witness told investigators that Butler pulled out a gun near a South Beach club early Monday, according to a Miami Beach police report. He was sitting in an S.U.V. when officers arrived and found a loaded gun in the vehicle. Butler faces charges of carrying a concealed firearm and improperly displaying a firearm.
